mapper.select: SELECT project_no AS projectNo, leader_no AS leaderNo, title, description, start_at AS startAt, deadline AS deadLine FROM project WHERE project_no = #{projectNo}
SELECT A.user_no AS userNo, A.nickname AS nickname, A.profile_pic AS userProfilePic FROM user A INNER JOIN user_project B ON A.user_no = B.user_no WHERE B.project_no = #{projectNo}
